review: More memory than Roku... just and over all better unit. If you have buffering issues get a dual band router and have your firestick be the only one on that channel... also, make sure you have a strong wireless signal by your TV. If you are deciding which one to choose... Let me make your decision for you... FIRE TV STICK!!!!
